episode: I rediscovered an old television show that I used to watch all of the time when I was a kid.  It made me miss those times.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: When I was a kid, I used to watch a show called Ghostwriter on PBS.  I recently rediscovered some episodes on Youtube.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a blast from the past!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It is.  It really made me feel nostalgic about those times.  Times were much more simple when I was a child.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's nice to reminisce about simpler times.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It is.  I like being an adult and the independence it brings.  But, I would like to take a trip back into time.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I think we all feel that way sometimes.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I used to watch Ghostwriter all of the time when I was sick and needed to stay home from school.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Sick days were the best, huh?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Somewhat.  I hated being sick.  Ghostwriter helped me to get my mind off of being sick.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It was a good distraction.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: The show also helped to exercise my imagination.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Nostalgia and creativity, what a great combo!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Agreed.  I hope children today have a show like Ghostwriter that they will look back on with positive memories.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Me too, that's special.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: While re-watching Ghostwriter, I saw some young actors that went on to be bigger actors as they grew up.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's cool, full circle moment.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It's interesting to see people before they became really famous.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: A glimpse of their humble beginnings.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Another show that makes me feel nostalgic is Reading Rainbow with Levar Burton.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Classic! That show was amazing.
